Text: Boy I wish people would stop throttling their upload capacity - for three days now, since this was offered(thank you so much uploader btw - the R4 copy I bought new is very bad quality - I'm hoping this is better), I've been downloading 1kB/s, and uploading 30-80. No way is everyone doing that. Open your throttles people, please! You can really make this site an unpleasant one if you insist on greed & not sharing - and the end result will be much less choice as people won't bother servicing such a selfish bunch.
